about_the_game:
The second DLC to the Coloring Game 3. Contains large highly-detailed images.
The completion of all the levels takes approximately 40 hours (10 images / 1,500,000px).

Theme: artworks
Size: 10 images / 1,500,000px
Duration: 40 hours

Please note that the Art Museum is not going to feature animation for completed images. The majority of images represent highly dynamic scenes, while the animation of eyes and other small parts of the images has failed to produce positive results. That is why we have decided to make an exception and not to add animation to this DLC. I hope for the players’ understanding on this matter.

The majority of images represent highly dynamic scenes, while the animation of eyes and other small parts of the images has failed to produce positive results. name: Coloring Game 3 - Art Museum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 256MB)

short_description: The second DLC to the Coloring Game 3. Contains large highly-detailed images.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
